Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent inquiries. Review the data quality monitoring dashboard to assess progress against the weekly targets.
Prepare a report summarizing the data quality performance for the week. Include key metrics, trends, and action plans.
Share the data quality report with relevant stakeholders (@da-1, @da-2, @clinlead-1, @rn-1, @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2, @itpm-1, @pchmp-1, @his-1) via email. Topic: Weekly Data Quality Report
Conduct a meeting with @da-1, @clinlead-1, and @ehrdev-1 to discuss the data quality report and identify any areas for improvement. Topic: Data Quality Report Review and Action Planning
Develop action plans to address any data quality issues identified during the meeting. Assign responsibilities and set deadlines for completion.
Implement the action plans to improve data quality. Collaborate with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to fix any data errors or inconsistencies.
Monitor the impact of the action plans on data quality. Track progress against the weekly targets using the data quality monitoring dashboard.
Document any lessons learned from the data quality improvement efforts. Use this information to refine the data quality metrics and weekly targets for future weeks.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the data quality improvement efforts and lessons learned. Share this presentation with relevant stakeholders.
Wrap up for the week. Review accomplishments and prioritize tasks for next week.
